pr_title: Update Ballerina.toml java8 platforms to java11

timeline.message: Update Ballerina.toml java8 platforms to java11

timeline.bodyText: Do we need to change this to java 11?
timeline.author: daneshk

replies.bodyText:
@daneshk not required for the functionality, just changed along with other changes to make it consistent.
I think line number 14 version also need to be changed 11 @NipunaRanasinghe

replies.bodyText: Yeah line 14 should also be changed and these required changes are already there in #26277. So +1 for getting this merged
